name: Outback Steakhouse Heroes Discount
description: 10% off every day for heroes with valid ID
fullDescription: Outback Steakhouse offers a 10% Heroes Discount every day for military, veterans, police, firefighters, first responders, nurses, doctors, and medical staff.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% off entire check every day
- Available for dine-in with valid ID
- Includes military, veterans, police, firefighters
- Also includes nurses, doctors, medical staff
- Online orders verified through SheerID
howToGetIt:
1. Dine in at any Outback Steakhouse location
2. Show valid military, medical, or service ID
3. 10% discount applied to check (excludes alcohol)
4. Maximum one discount per table
5. For online orders, verify through SheerID at checkout
keywords: Outback Steakhouse, military discount, veteran, first responder, police, firefighter, nurse, doctor, 10% off, restaurant, dining
